Articles.Content:
i have made a ksp server list for people who want to have their servers know to the world or people who want to find a server to play on.

the ULR is www.kspserverlist.weebly.com

please use the my email to give me you servers not tell me on the fourms

Edited November 20, 2013 by xjax1

please use the my email to give me you servers not tell me on the fourms

but you can reply and tell me what you think of the site

Edited November 12, 2013 by xjax1
ok why are you guys not replying?

hi don't we need an mod for multiplayer?

and there are no servers

we have a list 3 topics under here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56005-KMP-Public-Server-Collection

There is already a forum thread with a list of servers for KMP...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56005-KMP-Public-Server-Collection

As for your website, it's ok. Most of the Weebly stuff looks like copy-and-paste design so I'm not sure what kind of feedback you are looking for.

There's already a page operated by one of the #KMP Devs (Jumba) that lists all the active KMP Servers.

http://kerbal.wlsing.nl/

Suggest you join #KMP on irc.esper.net and talk to Jumba. Maybe you guys can join your efforts.

His list actually checks the health of the running servers.

(PS: Jumba is entering exams period so you might not be able to chat to him before monday).
my server list is heavy WIP so mayby we can join but need sugestions on how to make the site better
Did you even read the answers to your original post?
sorry but im not exacly the best at KMP can some one tell me how to join the server ive recived the handshake but how do i get in and play on the server?
yes i did im very active on the ksp foaurms and on my webcite

Rather than having several people start up their own "super dooper b3st eva KSPMM directory" website and step on each other's toes, you guys should consolidate your efforts and just create a single, centralised list on the forums.

how do i connect to a sever

?
